original_text: The time for Israel's punishment has arrived! The Lord must now pay them back for their sins. The Israelites will soon know about it! You do many sins and you hate the Lord. Because of that, you say that his prophets are fools. You think that his messengers are crazy. The time for Israel's punishment has arrived!
korean_text: 형벌의 날이 이르렀고 보응의 날이 온 것을 이스라엘이 알지라 선지자가 어리석었고 신에 감동하는 자가 미쳤나니 이는 네 죄악이 많고 네 원한이 큼이니라

sentences.original_text: The time for Israel's punishment has arrived!
The Lord must now pay them back for their sins.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 이제 그들의 죄에 대해 갚아주셔야 한다.

sentences.original_text: The Israelites will soon know about it!
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들은 곧 그것에 대해 알게 될 것이다!
